mapper.select: select id, staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, stuff_phone, stuff_email, stuff_adress, depart_name, staff_authority, in_time, is_resigned, resign_time from organize_staff where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into organize_staff(staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, stuff_phone, stuff_email, stuff_adress, depart_name, staff_authority, in_time, is_resigned, resign_time) values (#{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{staffGender}, #{stuffPhone}, #{stuffEmail}, #{stuffAdress}, #{departName}, #{staffAuthority}, #{inTime}, #{isResigned}, #{resignTime})

insert into organize_staff(staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, stuff_phone, stuff_email, stuff_adress, depart_name, staff_authority, in_time, is_resigned, resign_time) values
(#{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.staffGender}, #{entity.stuffPhone}, #{entity.stuffEmail}, #{entity.stuffAdress}, #{entity.departName}, #{entity.staffAuthority}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.isResigned}, #{entity.resignTime})

insert into organize_staff(staff_id, staff_name, staff_gender, stuff_phone, stuff_email, stuff_adress, depart_name, staff_authority, in_time, is_resigned, resign_time) values
(#{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.staffGender}, #{entity.stuffPhone}, #{entity.stuffEmail}, #{entity.stuffAdress}, #{entity.departName}, #{entity.staffAuthority}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.isResigned}, #{entity.resignTime})
on duplicate key update staff_id = values(staff_id), staff_name = values(staff_name), staff_gender = values(staff_gender), stuff_phone = values(stuff_phone), stuff_email = values(stuff_email), stuff_adress = values(stuff_adress), depart_name = values(depart_name), staff_authority = values(staff_authority), in_time = values(in_time), is_resigned = values(is_resigned), resign_time = values(resign_time)
mapper.update:
update organize_staff
staff_id = #{staffId},
staff_name = #{staffName},
staff_gender = #{staffGender},
stuff_phone = #{stuffPhone},
stuff_email = #{stuffEmail},
stuff_adress = #{stuffAdress},
depart_name = #{departName},
staff_authority = #{staffAuthority},
in_time = #{inTime},
is_resigned = #{isResigned},
resign_time = #{resignTime},
where id = #{id}
